title: Modal Opens and Closes with Smooth Animations
description: Verify that the Developer Modal opens and closes with smooth fade-in and fade-out animations, and that the backdrop appears and disappears correctly.

steps.description: Navigate to the main application page.
Click the 'Developer' button in the navigation bar.
Check that the modal appears with a smooth fade-in animation and a backdrop overlay.
Click the modal close button.
Verify the modal closes smoothly with fade-out animation and the backdrop disappears.
Repeat open and close using Escape key to close the modal.
Confirm modal closes smoothly and backdrop is removed.

title: 3D Scroll Animations Tilt Cards Correctly
description: Ensure 3D card scroll animations rotate the team member cards forward on downward scroll and backward on upward scroll, with rotation angles ranging between ±20° and 0°.

steps.description: Open the Developer Modal.
Scroll down inside the modal slowly and observe card rotations.
Verify cards tilt forward correctly with angles approaching +20° as scroll progresses.
Scroll up inside the modal slowly and observe card rotations.
Verify cards tilt backward correctly with angles approaching -20° as scroll reverses.
Scroll rapidly in both directions.
Confirm animation remains smooth and tilt angles are within specified range.

title: Image Loading with Fallback UI on Load Failure
description: Check that all guide and developer images load successfully and fallback UI elements appear if images fail to load, preventing broken visuals.

steps.description: Open the Developer Modal.
Verify all team member images load correctly without placeholders or broken icons.
Simulate image load failure by blocking image URLs or using corrupted image links.
Confirm fallback UI (such as placeholder icons or default avatars) is displayed instead of broken images.

title: Responsive Layout and Animation on Different Viewports
description: Verify that the modal layout and animations adapt appropriately on various device sizes, including mobile and desktop.

steps.description: Open the Developer Modal on a desktop viewport.
Check that modal layout uses desktop styling with appropriate sizes and spacing.
Scroll through the modal and verify animations perform smoothly at 60fps.
Resize browser window to mobile viewport dimensions or test on a physical mobile device.
Verify modal adjusts layout appropriately for mobile with correct scaling and spacing.
Scroll and interact within modal on mobile device.
Confirm animations remain smooth and responsive.

title: Dark Mode Styling and Readability
description: Validate that toggling dark mode updates modal styling correctly, maintaining text readability and consistent backdrop appearance.

steps.description: Open the Developer Modal in light mode.
Confirm modal styling uses light background and text colors with proper contrast.
Toggle dark mode via theme control.
Verify that modal background and backdrop update to dark theme styling.
Ensure all text remains readable with sufficient contrast under dark mode.

title: Accessibility: Keyboard Navigation and ARIA Support
description: Check keyboard navigation through modal elements is operational and ARIA labels enable screen reader compatibility.

steps.description: Open the Developer Modal.
Use Tab and Shift+Tab to navigate through modal interactive elements (close button, team member cards).
Verify the focus order is logical and cycles within the modal without escaping.
Activate interactive elements using keyboard Enter or Space keys.
Confirm that actions trigger expected behaviors.
Use a screen reader tool to read modal content.
Verify ARIA labels on modal, buttons, and cards provide meaningful descriptions.

title: Multiple Container Animations Operate Independently
description: Validate that the Guide and Developer sections inside the modal animate independently without cross-interference in their scroll animations.

steps.description: Open the Developer Modal.
Scroll the Guide section independently and observe 3D card rotation.
Confirm Guide container cards animate correctly.
Scroll Developer section independently.
Verify Developer section animations are independent and not influenced by Guide section.

title: Performance Benchmarks: 60fps and Memory Usage
description: Measure animation smoothness to achieve 60fps without frame drops and ensure memory usage per modal instance remains below 50MB after repeated open/close cycles.

steps.description: Open the Developer Modal and scroll through contents while monitoring frame rate using browser performance tools.
Verify animations run at 60 frames per second consistently without jitter.
Open and close the modal multiple times (e.g., 10 cycles).
Monitor memory usage to confirm no leaks and usage remains under 50MB.

title: Initial Load Time and Image Load Time Performance
description: Ensure the modal initial load time is under 500ms and all images load within 2 seconds on average under standard network conditions.

steps.description: Measure time from clicking the Developer button to the modal being fully visible with backdrop.
Confirm initial load time is less than 500 milliseconds.
Observe image load times for all team member pictures after modal opens.
Verify image load times are less than 2 seconds, with fallback shown if delayed.

title: Edge Case: Modal Open with No Scroll Interaction
description: Test the modal open behavior and verify 3D animations do not activate when user does not scroll.

steps.description: Open the Developer Modal.
Verify all cards remain in default rotation (0° tilt) when no scrolling occurs.
Wait for 10 seconds without scrolling.
Confirm that no animation jitter or unexpected rotation changes occur over time.
